name: NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF BAIL AGENTS
description: Industry association for the bail industry.
sampleDescriptions: Advocating on issues surrounding secured bail.
Protecting the constitutional right to bail. Urging Congress to recognize that secured bail results in higher appearance rates and protects victims and their families.
Protecting the constitutional right to bail. Urging Congress to recognize that secured bail results in higher appearance rates and protects victims and their families. Advocacy regarding HR 1249.
Protecting the constitutional right to bail. Urging Congress to recognize that secured bail results in higher appearance rates and protects victims and their families. Advocacy regarding HR 1249.

Protecting the constitutional right to bail. Urging Congress to recognize that secured bail results in higher appearance rates and protects victims and their families. Advocacy regarding HR 1249, HR 2
